pricing.Free: 0 USD/month. Great for individuals and small teams. Includes 3 users and basic API tools.
pricing.Basic: 14 USD/user/month. Includes 30 days of collection recovery and unlimited collaboration invitations.
pricing.Professional: 29 USD/user/month. Includes Single Sign-On (SSO) and basic roles and permissions (RBAC).
pricing.Enterprise: 49 USD/user/month. Includes advanced security, reporting, Domain Capture, and dedicated support.

faq.q: Do I need to know coding to use Postman?
faq.a: Not necessarily! You can use the visual interface to send requests, but knowing JavaScript helps for writing advanced tests.

faq.q: Can I use it for free?
faq.a: Yes, our Free tier is very generous. It allows up to 3 team members to collaborate and gives you access to the API Client and Mock Servers.
Absolutely. We are SOC 2 Type 2 compliant, use AES-256 encryption, and have a 'Secret Scanner' to prevent you from accidentally exposing API keys.

faq.q: What is the main difference between Professional and Enterprise?
faq.a: The Enterprise plan adds advanced security features like Domain Capture and custom governance rules, plus it includes dedicated support.
